summary: The 'Modern Authentication of Pharmaceuticals Act of 2025' aims to modernize how controlled substances are authenticated in the pharmaceutical supply chain. The bill mandates the inclusion of a physical chemical identifier on each dose of a solid oral dosage controlled substance, manufactured five years after the enactment. This identifier would be machine-readable and used to verify the authenticity of the product, amending existing sections of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
